Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Strongman and Sabotage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the events within a circus, starting with the introduction of Paul Bunyan and then shifting to a conflict involving a disgruntled former strongman, Matto Grasso, who attempts to sabotage the circus and Paul Bunyan's performance.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Introduction and Spectators
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and then shifts to the arrival and reactions of circus spectators, setting the initial atmosphere and characters.

narrative_arcs.title: Circus Spectators Arrive and React to a Giraffe

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Billings and Escalating Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the man in plaid shirt encountering Billings and escalating into a physical confrontation, followed by the introduction of a new threat with a pistol.

narrative_arcs.title: Responding to a Cry for Help and Confronting Billings
Billings' Display of Superhuman Strength and Attack
Pistol Threat and Escalation of Danger
Continuing Threats from Billings and the Pistol Man

sub_scenes.title: Exposition, Proposal and Paul Bunyan's Debut
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides exposition about Matto Grasso's motive, introduces a proposal for a new strongman, and then showcases Paul Bunyan's debut performance, setting up Grasso's envy.

narrative_arcs.title: Exposition on Matto Grasso and Circus Conflict
Proposal to Become the New Strong Man
Paul Bunyan's Debut and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Sabotage Attempts and Bunyan's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's revenge plans, first with kerosene and then with releasing an ape, and Paul Bunyan's interventions to control the chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Chase Enters the Arena and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Grasso vs Sonny and Bunyan's Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the fight between Grasso and Sonny, leading to Sonny being thrown onto the trapeze, police intervention, and ultimately Paul Bunyan's decision to leave the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto's Turn and Dominance in the Fight
The Trapeze Toss and Sonny's Protest
Sonny's Aerial Peril and Trapeze Rescue
Job Offer and Paul's Woodland Yearning

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's adventures, specifically his encounter with the Ogress of Tibet, involving a severed head, a magical dagger, and a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Marco Polo and Ghastly Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo and his adventurous persona, immediately followed by a gruesome discovery of a severed head in a wooded area.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo's Adventures and the Ogress of Tibet
Ghastly Discovery of a Severed Head

sub_scenes.title: The Talking Head and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the severed head can talk and pleads for rescue, leading to the rescuer saving the man and receiving a magical dagger as reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Life Debt and a Sacred Dagger
Reason for Silence and Parting Ways

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Hi-toun and King's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the rescuer's journey to Hi-toun, his misinterpretation of the city's atmosphere, and his encounter with the King who pleads for help to find his missing daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Welcome to Hi-toun
The King's Plea for His Missing Daughter

sub_scenes.title: Distressed Woman and Witch's Castle Deception
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a distressed woman pleading for help, leading Marco to follow her to a castle which turns out to be a witch's den.

narrative_arcs.title: A Desperate Mother and a Witch's Castle
Entering the Witch's Castle and Unveiling the 'Children'

sub_scenes.title: Escape from the Ogress and Royal Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details a separate capture and escape using a magical knife, followed by the rescuer returning the princess and declining a royal reward.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Fire Attack and Escape Attempt
The Fly Blade Attack and Ogress's Downfall

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure Keeper's Tale of Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a tale narrated by a treasure keeper, focusing on themes of treasure, betrayal, and revenge within a British penal colony setting.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Treasure Tale and Prison Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the treasure keeper narrator and sets the scene in a British penal colony, hinting at a story of treasure and escape plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Captain Brooking's Inquiry to Officer Jordan

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Proposition and Agreement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a prisoner proposing a treasure deal to Captain Brooking in exchange for escape, leading to an agreement.

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal, Revenge Vow, and Return to England
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the prisoner Jordan's realization of betrayal by the Captain, his vow for revenge, his eventual release, and his return to England to seek retribution.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Trap, and Deadly Fight in the Attic
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's arrival in England, his confrontation with the Captain, the Captain luring him into a trap in the attic, and their deadly fight over the treasure, culminating in a gunshot and police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Capture of a Suspect
Police Observation and Homicide Squad Call
Moral of the Tale: Money as Evil

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with the mystery surrounding the haunted Matthews estate, involving Dr. Styx, Henry Northrup, and the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of the Haunted Estate Problem
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the problem of the haunted Matthews estate, leading to Henry Northrup's involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Northrup's Expected Arrival and Supernatural Expertise

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Matthews Place and Ominous Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Henry Northrup's arrival at the Matthews estate and receiving an immediate warning about the dangers within.

narrative_arcs.title: Eerie Warning at the Old House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Henry Northrup entering the haunted house, confronting Vincent Matthews' ghost, their physical struggle, and eventual resolution through forgiveness and brotherly love, facilitated by a mysterious man in a hat.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Haunted House and Confronting Vincent Matthews
Questioning Violence and Nature of Fear
Confession and Desperate Plea for Love
Physical Restraint and Assertion of Power
Summoning Rosalind and the Opportunity for Redemption
Request for Forgiveness and Millennial Release
Demand for Brotherly Love and Ultimate Freedom

Major_Arcs.title: The Ill-Fated Voyage of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the story of Henry Hudson's voyages to find the Northwest Passage, focusing on his final, tragic voyage and the mutiny that led to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hudson's Fate and Commission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with the foreshadowing of Henry Hudson's tragic fate and then shifts back to the Dutch East India Company commissioning him to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Strange Fate of Henry Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Voyage, Discontent, and Hudson River Exploration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial stages of Hudson's voyage, the crew's growing discontent, their exploration of the Hudson River, and the eventual realization of its failure as the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: Weeks at Sea and Crew's Discontent
Hudson's Reflection on Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Mutiny, and Hudson's Abandonment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hudson's second voyage, the ship getting trapped in ice, the crew's escalating discontent leading to mutiny, and Hudson being set adrift by the mutineers, ultimately facing his tragic fate.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting Up a New Voyage for the Northwest Passage
Ship Stuck in Ice and Winter Quarters
Ice Melts and Crew's Demand to Return Home
Forced Adrift and Abandonment of Hudson
Arrest of the Mutineers Upon Return

Major_Arcs.title: Hassan the Arabian Knight vs. the Tartars
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Hassan, an Arabian Knight, tasked with rescuing a kidnapped woman from the Tartars, culminating in a confrontation with their leader, Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hassan and the Tartar Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan in action, being pursued by Tartars, and then shifts to the Caliph's court where Hassan receives his mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Introduction of Conflict
The Caliph's Summons and Mission Briefing
Setting off to Confront the Tartars

sub_scenes.title: Journey to the Oasis and Dire Warnings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's journey towards the Tartar camp, his stop at the oasis for information, and encountering a traveler who warns him of the dangers ahead.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey and Anticipation of the Oasis
Discovery of Tartar Tracks at the Oasis
Encounter with a Traveler and Dire Warning

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Capture in Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Hassan infiltrating the Tartar camp, subduing a sentry for disguise, overhearing information about the kidnapped girl, attempting contact, but ultimately getting caught by guards.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambush and Subjugation of the Sentry
Inside the Tartar Camp - Search Begins
Suspicion and Confrontation by Tartar Guards

sub_scenes.title: Challenge, Combat, and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's confrontation with Kurgan, the challenge to fight for the woman's freedom, Hassan's agreement, his internal resolve, the contest itself where Hassan defeats three warriors, and finally claims his reward and departs with the rescued woman.

narrative_arcs.title: The Contest Begins and Hassan's Dirt Strategy
Hassan's Victory Over Two Tartar Warriors
Kurgan Honors His Word and Departs
Questioning Hassan's Affection and a Blush
A Farewell Kiss and a Fine Reward
